title: Plastic Stone Crab/ Florida Lobster Gauge
description: Convenient gauge for checking if your Florida Spiny Lobsters and Stone Crabs catches are of legal size. 2-7/8" minimum for Stone Crab Claws and 3" minimum on Spiny Lobster carapace.
